00016 DbjErrorCode DbjCrossProductTuple::setLeftRightTuples(DbjTuple &left, 
00017         DbjTuple &right)
00018 {
00019     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00020 
00021     leftTuple = &left;
00022     rightTuple = &right;
00023 
00024     return DbjGetErrorCode();
00025 }

00027 
00028 DbjErrorCode DbjCrossProductTuple::getVarchar(Uint16 const columnNumber,
00029         char const *&stringValue,  Uint16 &stringLength) const
00030 {
00031     DbjErrorCode rc = DBJ_SUCCESS;
00032 
00033     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00034 
00035     if (columnNumber >= getNumberColumns()) {
00036         DBJ_SET_ERROR(DBJ_PARAMETER_FAIL);
00037         goto cleanup;
00038     }
00039 
00040     if (columnNumber < leftTuple->getNumberColumns()) {
00041         rc = leftTuple->getVarchar(columnNumber, stringValue, stringLength);
00042         if (rc != DBJ_SUCCESS) {
00043             DBJ_TRACE_ERROR();
00044             goto cleanup;
00045         }
00046     }
00047     else {
00048         rc = rightTuple->getVarchar(columnNumber - leftTuple->getNumberColumns(),
00049                 stringValue, stringLength);
00050         if (rc != DBJ_SUCCESS) {
00051             DBJ_TRACE_ERROR();
00052             goto cleanup;
00053         }
00054     }
00055 
00056  cleanup:
00057     return DbjGetErrorCode();
00058 }

00260 DbjErrorCode DbjCrossProductTuple::setLeftTuple(DbjTuple *newLeft)
00261 {
00262     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00263 
00264     if (!newLeft) {
00265         DBJ_SET_ERROR(DBJ_PARAMETER_FAIL);
00266         goto cleanup;
00267     }
00268 
00269     leftTuple = newLeft;

00271  cleanup:

00273 }
